website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy cast iron skillet that is great for all-purpose cooking.
pros: Consistent heat distribution and sturdy quality are two of the biggest praises users have for this classic cookware staple
cons: Some users had issues with the quality, including rust or defects upon arrival
The cast iron is also thinner than the Lodge model

customer_reviews.title: 10.25" pan split after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: The 10.25" Westinghouse cast iron pan I had split in two while heating up for its fourth use. The first three times I used it, it worked fine, browning meat nicely and cleaning easily. The fourth time though, I was heating it up to 440F degrees on an induction burner as I had before, and soon after I put the pan on, it just split in half. Fortunately I also had the 12" pan, and it worked fine as a replacement. I don't know if my 10.25" had a manufacturing defect or not, but be aware that if it happened to me, it may also happen again to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Jacket Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This cast iron skillet has already begun to display discoloration and I’ve only had it for a month. They will not take it back and I will not order these types of things from Amazon ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne L.

customer_reviews.title: I does what it’s supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: It’s your typical black skillet. It’s heavy, it’s hard to clean, and needs to be taken care of after each use. Just like any other real cast iron skillet. This one is the heaviest one amazon sells in this size (heavier the better, because it will retain heat better)
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Defects
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Cooking surface is uneven: Smooth in one spot and rough over the rest with a hard speck of splatter that doesn't come off. This would be a spot where food would stick if I hadn't returned it.
customer_reviews.author: StoddardsHale

customer_reviews.title: Great frying pan, unbelievable price!
customer_reviews.text: Serious cast iron frying pan. Very heavy and comes already seasoned, so it's ready to go to work. Definitely not for the weak, it must weigh close to 10#!
customer_reviews.author: song sparrow's

customer_reviews.title: Make sure this is the size pan you want: it's huge!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a huge pan! I ordered the wrong size. I got one way bigger than I wanted. Fifteen inches covers almost one entire side of my stove. That being said, that was MY fault. The pan is well constructed and easy to handle. I've gifted mine forward to one of my son's to use on a campfire where its size is more appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Finish not too bad, recommend a good clean and re-season prior to ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy crude cast iron pan. Today's Lodge cast iron is much better quality, but for a 15' pan that I will infrequently need it is fine. It is much heavier than my old Wagner, but it is how they make them today. Finish not too bad, recommend a really good clean and re-season prior to use. I lightly filed and ground some rough spots prior to seasoning - it wasn't really necessary but now it should clean up better. Will need typical cast iron care to prevent rust, as all cast iron does. Even the classic Griswolds rust if not seasoned
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice saute skillet
customer_reviews.text: After a few months, I kove this skillet so much I just ordered another! It's 8 in size is a little smaller than the Lodge 10 in one and perfect got sauteeing. It has a bit of a rough surface but no worse than my Lodge wok and after a few uses and reseasoning each time. I really don't notice it any more.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: How Do You Cook With a Sandpaper Surface?
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this pan, most of the inside surface was like sandpaper! There was a small section that was finished with a smooth surface. I thought the pan was defective and returned it for another. The surface in the replacement was entirely rough, like sandpaper. I've owned many cast iron skillets and Dutch ovens before. The surface, inside and outside, was always smooth. It's impossible to cook with this pan because everything will stick, and food like pancakes would just fall apart when you tried to turn them.
customer_reviews.author: Don M

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: We had used our skillet about 5 times-sometimes in the oven, sometimes on the stove. This week we started to cook and heated up the pan with some oil. Turns out our skillet had a hairline crack in it that we couldn’t see, and it and oil started leaking out onto the burner. It immediately started smoking like crazy, setting off the fire alarm for our apartment complex. This was absolutely ridiculous. This product is absolute TRASH. Do not buy it!!!!! There are so many more cast iron skillets that won’t give you the embarrassment of evacuating your whole building.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Skillet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cast iron skillet. I have been trying to get into cooking for awhile and I have to say purchasing one of these has made cooking so much more fun. My only complaint is that it says pre-seasoned, which is true, but the factory seasoning is a bit thin. Especially on the surfaces that aren't making contact with food. After my first meal I noticed the bottom seasoning had began wearing. However, seasoning isn't that hard and I feel once I have seasoned it a time or two more it will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great for Steaks and Pizza
customer_reviews.text: We have used for big steaks and pizza and all tasted great. you need two hands to move the pan!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jed Wagennknecht

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: I think this skillet is a very good value and does what I want to do. It worked well for browning for our Christmas dinner and is easy to clean. The silicone handle grip is especially handy. Heat dissipation is good.
customer_reviews.author: Vette69

customer_reviews.title: Poor material of construction
customer_reviews.text: Even after using for a month, the rusting has not gone. I believe this is due to poor material of construction
customer_reviews.author: Kannan Thangaraj

customer_reviews.title: but so far it has worked wonderfully. It is huge and holds a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this twice, but so far it has worked wonderfully. It is huge and holds a lot of food for my family. I would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great cast iron skillet.
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I made was a one pot meal that is finished in the oven.the food was great ,and the pan cleaned up so easily I was amazed. It was worth more then it cost for sure. I want to cook everything in my new cast iron skillet. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Wain

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and was very impressed with the quality. I plan to order one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Huge skillet, well made
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very well made and HUGE! I can barely pick it up - my fault for not reading the product description better - but it would be great if you have to prepare a meal for a big group.
customer_reviews.author: Laure J

customer_reviews.title: Defective. Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Non-stick finish was sprayed on handle (including silicone gripper) and missing from half of the inside of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: Warped, poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: This pan is warped , the middle is high so all the oil goes to the edges and the food burns and sticks in the middle. It’s unusable at this point, and it’s too late to return it. It’s huge. We didn’t understand what was wrong with it until it was too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Kini Christie

customer_reviews.title: Size.....HUGE
customer_reviews.text: Havent used yet. Has same rough finish as Lodge and other brands. I'll need to sand and polish before a full review. They are however.....HUGE!!!! You could probly fry a full 5lb bag of potatoes or scramble 3 dozen or more eggs at once in one single pan. Will add or subtract stars if allowed at a later date
customer_reviews.author: Harold Orrick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & great size!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality & great size! I was able to fit about 11 large chicken drumsticks in this pan - absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Skillet, i am also going to order a smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Judy H.

customer_reviews.title: QC issues?
customer_reviews.text: We purchased another brand after receiving the 2nd pan. The first had a crack near the handle so we ordered a replacement, when we opened the box, the handle had broken off. Oddly enough, it broke in the same place the 1st one had the crack
customer_reviews.author: ShaNell A.

customer_reviews.title: Still prefers Lodge
customer_reviews.text: The casting is just not as good as Lodge. Clearly inferior. Not worth saving a few bucks for a pan that will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: DSH

customer_reviews.title: Very rough product !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a large heavy skillet, but was disappointed at how rough the inside was..Don't think I have ever seen one this bad. For this reason I would not recommend ..
customer_reviews.author: MAdkins

customer_reviews.title: Great skillet
customer_reviews.text: Really nice pan! I’ve had it two days and have already used it 3 times. Very happy with the quality and performance. Easy to clean. Heat distribution is excellent. I’ve missed having a cast iron skillet, this was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this little frying pan it's perfect for a steak and easy to take care of recommend forsure
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Always wanted one of these.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how big the 15in is. Might need to get a few more in the smaller sizes for simlpe cooking. Sturdy Heavy, Cooks very evenly (i pre heat in the oven first) Only draw back is you have to remember the handle gets super hot. I recommend getting some rubber sleeves for the two handles.
customer_reviews.author: DasDecoy

customer_reviews.title: New cast iron lover
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Can’t wait to try some other style or sizes
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty, seasoned cast iron skillet. The handle protector is a bit large, but a nice addition to the skillet

customer_reviews.title: Great economical cast iron skillet.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for price. Main use is for baking skillet cakes such as pineapple upside down cake.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PAN FOR A FAMILY
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pan. I had to return it because for my needs it was too large. If you have a big family this would be great.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Love it. Some day I’ll actually use it.

customer_reviews.title: Just Like Mom's
customer_reviews.text: It brings back memories of when I was little and Mom would prepare breakfast!!

customer_reviews.text: This item was larger than I thought it would be but arrived promptly and in excellent shape, ready to use, NO RUST! YEA! Net time I have my adult kids over and grandkids, breakfast will be no problem!

customer_reviews.title: I like
customer_reviews.text: My first cast iron pan so not sure what to expect. Cooked a few items in it so far, I like ot

customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed cooking with my first Iron Skillet. It does the job and what's better about it was I got such a great price for it. Easy to clean and practical.

customer_reviews.title: Rusts within one use DO NOT PURCHASE!!!

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom for Christmas. She has not had one in a long time. She really enjoyed the handle cover it came with. I was there for the first meal she used it for. Had some delicious tacos.

customer_reviews.title: This just made me sad.
customer_reviews.text: Mine cracked within a week. Some of the skillets I have are more than 30 years old. I know how to treat them. This just made me sad.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Never had cooked in a cast iron skillet before. You may need to look up on how to season and care for it but I don't think I'll cook in anything else now

customer_reviews.text: Cooking surface way too rough. Does not smooth out over time. Difficult to season. Won.t buy again.

customer_reviews.title: It's fine except so very heavy
customer_reviews.text: It's fine except so very heavy. Also, I do have a flat cooktop but will keep it for oven or grill.

customer_reviews.title: Size is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than it appears. I don't use it too often because I thought it was much bigger.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like cooking in this, just as expected, great price for this nice and heavy pan.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice skillet, but way too big for what I was looking for.

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING IS NO JOKE!!! BEST VALUE ON AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: SEARED 10 STEAKS WITH THE POWER OF THE GODS!!! THIS THING IS AMZING AND BEST VALUE ON AMAZON UPKEEP EASY AND SIMPLE..

customer_reviews.text: It is very hard to clean. Food will burn in it.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Surface is not sm
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this pan cause it has a rough finish and food sticks to the bottom a real waste, I purchased it to make eggs but it doesn’t work well.
customer_reviews.author: diana ordonez

customer_reviews.title: the cooking area is just too small otherwise the quality is fine.
customer_reviews.text: The pan has a slopped side so the bottom is only about 6.5" diameter, the cooking area is just too small otherwise the quality is fine.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love that it came with the silicone handle and it was a very thick pan. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift for my son in law. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've been missing a good skillet in our kitchen for some time
customer_reviews.text: I've been missing a good skillet in our kitchen for some time. This skillet will out last me. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Morris

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as a 57 year old Wagner pan
customer_reviews.text: Quite happy with this skillet. Have been using my mother's 57 year old Wagner 8 inch frying pan and looked for a larger pan. The Westinghouse pan has a surface that is rough like fine sandpaper but is just as non stick as the smooth surface of the Wrangler. Eggs have not stuck to this pan. I have to be careful when using a paper towel to clean the pan as the towel will get shredded from the rough surface. Would buy another Westinghouse pan when I need one of the other sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Roger W. Colson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As good as any cast iron skillet that I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 8" pan when it was on sale. I have a big Lodge Logic pan and love it, so I thought it would be nice to have a small one. When it arrived, half of the interior cooking surface was very rough, and the other half was completely smooth. Not usable in my opinion. A friend was over and said they would take it, so I just gave it to them. I ordered a small Lodge Logic and am happy with it. I was not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Michi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item but needs work
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pan after a couple years of cooking with it (not eggs though). I love CI cookware as I do a good amount of camping use it at home also. I have 2 grills, 3 dutch ovens and 3 12" pans but this pan although I like it is the roughest most poorly finished one of the bunch. I's going to take some cooking to get this pan to where it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Woops

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It's exactly like all my expensive ones at a fraction of the price! It's sturdy and well made. I cooked in it tonight and easily wiped it out for cleaning and it left no film or reside or chips or flakes as some suggest with these pans. I'm very happy
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Mendes Brown

customer_reviews.title: Think Lodge for the long haul.
customer_reviews.text: Very thin cast iron. Less than impressed. Pan was cracked upon arrival and returned. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeteye

customer_reviews.title: ... rough surface to the pan initially and things will easily stick. With the surface being rough
customer_reviews.text: Very rough surface to the pan initially and things will easily stick. With the surface being rough, it is difficult to clean. But it was for a cheap price and serves it purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: A little disAppointed at rounded bottom - assumed it would be flat
customer_reviews.text: A little disAppointed at rounded bottom - assumed it would be flat. Also texture is not smooth, which seems odd.
customer_reviews.author: Deebee

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk washed it before use and it was full of rust! UNREAL! Didn't even use it!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Sticks and has imperfections.
customer_reviews.text: Rough finish except for a large round smooth spot in skillet and up the side. Everything sticks except to the smooth part. I should have sent it back but I used it and then found it sticks. I have tried everything to season it, so it won't stick, but nothing works.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Holford

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: After the first time used, the pan was rusty. My wife asked if we can continue use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mawdo Alendy

customer_reviews.title: Real Piece Of Ferrous Trash bad Made In China
customer_reviews.text: Real Piece Of Ferrous Trash bad Made In China, so bad casting that you can not even read the logo in the handle, very rough and uneven surface....Lodge is MADE IN USA and still being the best choice
customer_reviews.author: Krater

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The skillet looks good but it came without the silicone handle!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Laskowske

customer_reviews.title: Preseason is useless
customer_reviews.text: It rusted after just one use. I was very disappointed about the preseason feature. Sadly I passed the return window of one month. If any possible, still want to return this product and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: I had water in it overnight, it was rusted ...
customer_reviews.text: I had water in it overnight, it was rusted by the next morning. Its junk do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: tania

customer_reviews.title: I use this on my gas grill, oven and range BEWARE NOT A 15 INCH PAN
customer_reviews.text: this works well and is ready to use on receipt HOWEVER, IT'S NOT A 15 INCH PAN. It's an 8 inch pan. I already had this size I wanted a larger one.That said, I just cooked grilled onions on the grill and it's the fastest and best I've done them in this pan. A little butter, peppers and the onions cooked up perfect better than the aluminum foil pans I was using. I will be ordering this in a larger size as I use it so often,
customer_reviews.author: spiderette

customer_reviews.title: This is a good deal for the price but the quality just isn't there
customer_reviews.text: This is a good deal for the price but the quality just isn't there, it seems to be very rough textured. It says that it has already been pre-seasoned but I think it needs to be seasoned properly before use - I am not sure what they use to season it but it really didn't seem like much. My other cast iron pants are a smoother texture but this one seemed very rough when wiping it out. I saw some suggestions about sanding it but I am not sure it's worth the time.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, well constructed. Cooked very evenly. The silicone grip was included at no cost. Highly recommend this excellent value - very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: LLJ

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be aware.
customer_reviews.text: Pan came in an unfinished cooking surface including metal stalagmites on surface that a spatula would hit and come to a screaming halt. I had to take a grinder to to it to smooth it off . Then re season pan. It works great now. My can’t lift it because the weight so I get to clean after every use , but it will cook 4 Steaks at once and go directly into the oven
customer_reviews.author: Mike Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Lodge cast iron is better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: good size pan for feeding large group, low price Cons: the surface of the cast iron is very rough, much rougher than Lodge cast iron cookwares. This means it takes much long for the surface to season. Even though this is advertised as pre-seasoned, food still sticks due to the roughness on the surface of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Samwise

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars !
customer_reviews.text: Definitely zero stars! Food stuck to the bottom from the very first use. I followed the instructions and it is either piece of crap or it was sent used to me.
customer_reviews.author: Julietta

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Huge, heavy and just what you want. I have my share of the leading brand of Cast Iron, so I thought I was taking a chance on this. So glad I did! The comparative price point is almost laughable. This is high quality, nicely seasoned and big enough to cook an 84 Porterhouse... if that's your thing.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. I made hamburgers in it & they came out great. This is a good size & not super heavy like most cast iron cookware is. It isn't as thick as my other cast iron pan but I wasn't expecting it to be.
customer_reviews.author: J-d-s

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Mine doesn't seem to heat as evenly as another brand I have. I got this on a Deal of the Day (or other similar promotion) for $5.97 and it was maybe worth that much. I'd recommend you take the current price of $10-11 and put that money towards a Lodge. This one was retired from home use and will go in the camper for over fire cooking.
customer_reviews.author: ceej

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper here!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these and got a fantastic deal on them. I love the rubber handle cover that you place on the handle to remove from the heat! No more burning my finger prints off! I purchased these to cook over the fire at camp and clean up was super easy as they were pre-seasoned. I plan to purchase a variety of sizes for camp use and will purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Jones

customer_reviews.title: ... I needed a bigger skillet and this is a great size. As it turns out
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because I needed a bigger skillet and this is a great size. As it turns out, it was not a good choice. The skillet does not heat evenly, I don't quite understand how that is possible but it is. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love these Cast Iron cookware pans Nice size and handy removable hot grip

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cast Iron Pans for the price as can't go wrong. GreaT Deal
customer_reviews.text: WOrks Great for the price as felt like I stole this on amazon prime for under 10 smackers.

customer_reviews.title: It's my favorite pan!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first cast iron pan I've owned and, after ~6 weeks, it's my favorite pan! It came seasoned, but I seasoned it as well and clean up is quick and easy. It was priced right and arrived fast.
customer_reviews.author: Als10Point

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted a cast iron skillet for a long time. This one is great for the price

customer_reviews.title: Geart product.
customer_reviews.text: Really good pan. Stays nice after use and is easy to clean. Nothing sticks. The side are just right to prevent a lot of splatter. Currently my best pan.
customer_reviews.author: B. C. Mumma

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. The size was exactly what I wanted price was too but they didnt mill the inside too smooth its got more bumps thatb a gravel road i would have sent it back but i lucky my husband is a machinist. He mill it down for me
customer_reviews.author: chris Kornmiller

customer_reviews.title: 🥰 love it
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with cast iron. It’s not heavy for the size and it’s the right size for one person. The handle cover is a must have
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl R.G. Samms

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a professional chef and she loves the pan I got her for Mother's Day!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Nice small skillet
customer_reviews.text: Thought it will be a bit larger, but still a very nice skillet, I love it has the rubber handle.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Came beautifully seasoned. It is huge
customer_reviews.text: Came beautifully seasoned. It is huge, and very heavy. I'm glad I have a gas stove for this as I cannot imagine how long it would take to heat on an electric. Made delicious fajitas with lots of leftovers for lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Inquisitor

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: I like the pan however its smaller than I thought. It seems more like a 6 inch as opposed to the 8 inch it is.
customer_reviews.author: V.Saxon

customer_reviews.title: BIG pan!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my sister as she has always wanted a big cast iron pan. This was fabulous and arrived right on time. I have looked all over for one and this was the best deal!

product_meta.title: Westinghouse Select Series Seasoned Cast Iron 10 1/4 Inch Skillet
product_meta.description: This Westinghouse seasoned cast iron 10 ¼” inch skillet screams versatility, allowing you to make an almost endless assortment of delicious foods all in one pan. Use it over high heat to brown foods perfectly. If you’re sear roasting, it’s a great choice since it can be transferred directly to a hot oven with no worries. Create restaurant-quality French toast or potato pancakes with golden brown, crispy exteriors and it’s also ideal for making corn bread, frittatas and flat bread in the oven.
feature_bullets: Super versatility - use on a stove top, oven, broiler or even over a campfire**
Pre-seasoned and ready to use. Basic maintenance required, including drying after each cleaning. Refer to user manual for details.
Value added integrated opening in the handle allows for easy hanging
Heats evenly and retains heat well, making it ideal for keeping foods warmer longer
**Not recommended for ceramic and/or glass smooth top ranges.
